short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sync your Spotify music with someone else's.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you sync Spotify music with another person. Documentation is on the way, but for now I don't recommend installing this app unless you know exactly what you're doing.
